definition[0]: on the inside or close to the centre of something
definition[1]: inner thoughts or feelings are ones that you feel strongly but do not always show to other people
example[3]: Yoga gives me a sense of inner calm.
example[4]: Sheâ€™ll need great inner strength to get over the tragedy.
example[5]: She never shared her inner thoughts with anyone.
definition[2]: relating to things which happen or exist but are not easy to see
example[6]: the inner workings of the film industry
example[7]: the fascinating inner life of a political party
